response.original_title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
response.overview: A reporter in Iraq might just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the U.S. Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.
response.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats

titles.title: Czlowiek, który gapil sie na kozy
Les hommes qui regardent les chèvres
The Men Who Stare at Goats
Els homes que miraven fixament les cabres
Los hombres que miraban fijamente a las cabras
Oi antres pou koitoun epimona katsikes
